overview:
## Discussion

The system is usually expressed as a URL from the [https://terminology.hl7.org/]. For example, the RxNorm, a coding system for medications uses: `http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm`.

# system

**Instance Property**

The string that identifies the coding system that defines this clinical code.

## Declaration

```swift
var system: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The system is usually expressed as a URL from the [https://terminology.hl7.org/]. For example, the RxNorm, a coding system for medications uses: `http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm`.
title: system
